title: 旧约 - 撒母耳记下(2 Samuel) - 第 8 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 撒母耳记下(2 Samuel) -- 第 8 章 ( 本篇共有 24 章 )

lineList.en: And after this it came to pass that David smote the Philistines, and subdued them: and David took Methegammah out of the hand of the Philistines.
lineList.cn: 此后，大卫攻打非利士人，把他们治服，从他们手下夺取了京城的权柄（原文作母城的嚼环）。

lineList.en: And he smote Moab, and measured them with a line, casting them down to the ground; even with two lines measured he to put to death, and with one full line to keep alive. And so the Moabites became David's servants, and brought gifts.
lineList.cn: 又攻打摩押人，使他们躺卧在地上，用绳量一量，量二绳的杀了，量一绳的存留。摩押人就归服大卫，给他进贡。

lineList.en: David smote also Hadadezer, the son of Rehob, king of Zobah, as he went to recover his border at the river Euphrates.
lineList.cn: 琐巴王利合的儿子哈大底谢往大河去，要夺回他的国权。大卫就攻打他，

lineList.en: And David took from him a thousand chariots, and seven hundred horsemen, and twenty thousand footmen: and David houghed all the chariot horses, but reserved of them for an hundred chariots.
lineList.cn: 擒拿了他的马兵一千七百，步兵二万，将拉战车的马砍断蹄筋，但留下一百辆车的马。

lineList.en: And when the Syrians of Damascus came to succour Hadadezer king of Zobah, David slew of the Syrians two and twenty thousand men.
lineList.cn: 大马士革的亚兰人来帮助琐巴王哈大底谢，大卫就杀了亚兰人二万二千。

lineList.en: Then David put garrisons in Syria of Damascus: and the Syrians became servants to David, and brought gifts. And the LORD preserved David whithersoever he went.
lineList.cn: 于是大卫在大马士革的亚兰地设立防营，亚兰人就归服他，给他进贡。大卫无论往哪里去，耶和华都使他得胜。

lineList.en: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadadezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
lineList.cn: 他夺了哈大底谢臣仆所拿的金盾牌，带到耶路撒冷。

lineList.en: And from Betah, and from Berothai, cities of Hadadezer, king David took exceeding much brass.
lineList.cn: 大卫王又从属哈大底谢的比他和比罗他城中夺取了许多的铜。

lineList.en: When Toi king of Hamath heard that David had smitten all the host of Hadadezer,
lineList.cn: 哈马王陀以听见大卫杀败哈大底谢的全军，

lineList.en: Then Toi sent Joram his son unto king David, to salute him, and to bless him, because he had fought against Hadadezer, and smitten him: for Hadadezer had wars with Toi. And Joram brought with him vessels of silver, and vessels of gold, and vessels of brass:
lineList.cn: 就打发他儿子约兰去见大卫王，问他的安，为他祝福，因为他杀败了哈大底谢，原来陀以与哈大底谢常常争战。约兰带了金银铜的器皿来，

lineList.en: Which also king David did dedicate unto the LORD, with the silver and gold that he had dedicated of all nations which he subdued;
lineList.cn: 大卫王将这些器皿和他治服各国所得来的金银都分别为圣，献给耶和华，

lineList.en: Of Syria, and of Moab, and of the children of Ammon, and of the Philistines, and of Amalek, and of the spoil of Hadadezer, son of Rehob, king of Zobah.
lineList.cn: 就是从亚兰，摩押，亚扪，非利士，亚玛力人所得来的，以及从琐巴王利合的儿子哈大底谢所掠之物。

lineList.en: And David gat him a name when he returned from smiting of the Syrians in the valley of salt, being eighteen thousand men.
lineList.cn: 大卫在盐谷击杀了亚兰（或作以东，见诗篇六十篇诗题）一万八千人回来，就得了大名。

lineList.en: And he put garrisons in Edom; throughout all Edom put he garrisons, and all they of Edom became David's servants. And the LORD preserved David whithersoever he went.
lineList.cn: 又在以东全地设立防营，以东人就都归服大卫。大卫无论往哪里去，耶和华都使他得胜。

lineList.en: And David reigned over all Israel; and David executed judgment and justice unto all his people.
lineList.cn: 大卫作以色列众人的王，又向众民秉公行义。

lineList.en: And Joab the son of Zeruiah was over the host; and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud was recorder;
lineList.cn: 洗鲁雅的儿子约押作元帅。亚希律的儿子约沙法作史官。

lineList.en: And Zadok the son of Ahitub, and Ahimelech the son of Abiathar, were the priests; and Seraiah was the scribe;
lineList.cn: 亚希突的儿子撒督和亚比亚他的儿子亚希米勒作祭司长。西莱雅作书记。

lineList.en: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over both the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and David's sons were chief rulers.
lineList.cn: 耶何耶大的儿子比拿雅统辖基利提人和比利提人。大卫的众子都作领袖。
